page.title: 16My House
page.content: My house is terraced.I live at 25 Alpine Terrace.My house is made from brick & the roof is slated.We have 2 bedrooms,2 toilets 1 outside & 1 inside.A living room and a kitchen.1 of the bedrooms was built on.We also have a bathroom. Altogether there is 5 rooms.My house has a coal fire.Our radiators work off the fire.We have 1 in the living room, bathroom,the 2 bedrooms and the kitchen.We have a side garden with a shed.A third of the garden is lawn,a third is for flowers and a third is for gardening.We have running water in the bathroom and kitchen.We also have electric.We don't have any gas.We do not own our house yet.It is being bought by paying every week.We have a garage at the back of the garden leadind into the back street.
